game.name: LOCUST USA
game.desc: Horror-Mystery-Exploration-Brick-Breaking with BOSS FIGHTS and 80s REFERENCES - fight a malevolent supercomputer, scour a dead guy's house for clues, collect keycards, banish a basement demon! From the master of breakout games Harley Wilson aka CURSED BOOTLEG INC. at https://hwilson.itch.io/locustusa2
